item.title: Using Anki-editor to build flashcard in Emacs Org-mode 【用 Anki-editor 在 Emacs Org-mode 中生成复杂记忆卡片】
item.description: 1. Anki One of a major activity in my daily work is to learn new things. I have rely heavily on paper flashcard which gives me most flexibility on keeping tables, code, math functions etc. But the shortcoming is pretty obvious: there is no scientific reviewing cycle, and it’s getting cumbersome to maintain and carry with. Then I dived into different softwares and discovered Anki has been exceled in every
